name: Claude Token Tracker
description:
Claude's rate limits reset on a rolling window — but the UI never tells you when. This Mac menu bar app watches your Claude Code sessions and shows you precisely how much capacity you have left and a countdown to the next reset.

Started as a frustration with being mid-flow and suddenly hitting the limit with no warning. Built the simplest possible thing: a tiny bar in the menu bar that drains as you use tokens, and a countdown when you're rate limited.
